update per_course_integration
SCORE = #{score,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IF_SHARE = #{ifShare,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IF_LEARN = #{ifLearn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

and USER_ID like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{userId}),'%')
